Read PCGR TSV File

Source: R/pcgr.R
pcgr_tiers_tsv_read.Rd

Reads the snvs_indels.tiers.tsv (or v2's snv_indel_ann.tsv.gz) file output by PCGR.

Usage

pcgr_tiers_tsv_read(x = NULL)

Arguments

x

Path to PCGR snvs_indels.tiers.tsv/snv_indel_ann.tsv.gz file.

Value

A tibble with the contents of the input TSV file, or NULL if x is NULL.

Examples

x <- system.file(
  "rawdata/test_data/umccrised/test_sample_WGS/small_variants",
  "TEST-somatic.pcgr.snvs_indels.tiers.tsv",
  package = "RNAsum"
)
(ptsv <- pcgr_tiers_tsv_read(x))
#> # A tibble: 99 × 61
